page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT IN CHITTERNE
page.content: A large proportion of the workforce in Chitterne finds employment elsewhere. The only significant employer within the area is Dan Maid Seafoods Ltd. on the Chitterne to Codford road. This forms alarge complex of warehousing, packing sheds and offices for the packing and distribution of frozen seafoods. It was established in 196O, and employs 66 people. Some temporary staff are employed during the summer months. The Land Defence Agent, on behalf of the Army, employs a small number of men to look after and maintain farmhouses and buildings belonging to M.O.D. within a 3O mile radius of Chitterne.
